Natsumi stared intently at her arm, doing her best to try to discern whether it was actually growing any larger or if she was just imagining things. For the moment at least, she decided that everything seemed normal. The limb was snug in the cuff, but no more than was to be expected during a blood pressure examination. The young girl let out a breath that she hadn't realized she'd been holding, relieved that puberty hadn't claimed her for its own yet; it had been a while since she'd measured herself, so maybe she really had grown an inch over the past several months. It was probably nothing to worry about.

The doctor returned just as the nurse finished the examination, removing the cuff from Natsumi's arm and jotting down the information on a nearby clipboard. The visit then proceeded as was normal, with Doctor Reinvich checking the young girl's eyes, ears, and reflexes before declaring that she seemed to be in perfect health. Finally, some good news, Natsumi thought to herself, smiling at last as she hopped down from the examination table. While her mother and the doctor left the room to discuss payment, the nurse was kind enough to offer the little Japanese girl a lollipop, the grape sucker sliding between her lips in no time. Distracted by the sweet taste of her treat, Natsumi didn't notice the sudden jolt of warmth that ran through her body, nor the ever so subtle tightening of her clothes. It was only half-an-inch, but as the young girl skipped her way out of the room, the nurse couldn't help but wonder if she looked slightly taller than when she'd arrived.

The ride home from the doctor's office was surprisingly uneventful, Natsumi content to suck on her lollipop in silence as her mother navigated the town's twisting streets. This sense of calm was interrupted the moment the girl entered her house, her eyes widening as she opened the door and saw what lay beyond. Natsumi was greeted by the sight of her older sister Hanako walking by, an extremely tight top emphasizing just how large her sister's breasts had become. Blushing as she stared open-mouthed at her sister's side profile, the girl suddenly regained her senses and dashed upstairs before Hanako or her mother could catch her in such a compromising position.

Natsumi spent the rest of the night doing her best to avoid her sister, getting the next two days of homework out of the way in the process. Dinner had been awkward, as she'd expected, but Hanako had thankfully changed her shirt, which made the situation far more bearable than it would have been otherwise. Still, Natsumi was glad when she was able to finally retire to her room, hoping that a good night's sleep would put all of the embarrassment behind her.

As she slipped beneath the covers, the young Japanese girl felt a strangely warm feeling creep up her spine, a contented sigh escaping her lips as her face flushed. For some reason, her blankets felt incredibly warm tonight, not that Natsumi was complaining; still, she couldn't shake the feeling that the pleasant sensation was somehow familiar. She soon fell asleep pondering these thoughts, lost in a sea of warm bliss.

The next morning...

Natsumi waited in the school office. She worried about her plan and hopped that the nice school nurse would hurry up and come. For she was worried about this plan from the start. For all she wanted to do was get out of this school before the worst could possibly happen. While she waited, her mind raced and raced. As she sat in the office, her clothes started to strain again... she knew exactly what was occurring. She was growing again! Only this time, the pace was a tad quicker. She darted her head to the left and right quickly as she thought what she should do. Upon quickly standing, a loud rip echoed across the small cramped office.

The Receptionist heard this and quickly stopped what she was currently doing and asked her what just happen. Natsumi blushed and struggled to form words. The Receptionist asked her to repeat what she said, but just as she did... Natsumi experienced a few spurts in growth! A quick yelp escaped Natsumi's mouth as the school's Receptionist's eyes just bulged out as she screamed, "What in the WORLD is happening to you miss!?"

A rip here, a tear there, all sounds of fabric being torn apart could be heard. It wasn't long till Natsumi shot up and bashed into the ceiling above her head!

Everyone outside saw this and at first didn't know how to react,, but it only took a mere second for them to panic and reenact a Godzilla film. Natsumi cried out in embarrassment and just begged for it to stop as she just grew, and Grew, and GREW!!

Before her worst case scenario could continue in her mind. She was snapped out of it as she overheard some talking just outside the office.

"I mean, a babysitter? What was she thinking?"

"Okay ma'am, don't worry. We will handle this. Thank you for calling."

Natsumi was confused as she saw that the Receptionist was still at her desk and she was writing stuff down, so who was talking outside the office. But before she could wonder this any further. Two male officers stepped in!

"Miss, can you please come with us?" One of the Police Officers asked politely.

Natsumi was unsure at first, but her mom always told her to trust police men. So she went with them without a struggle. She felt a sudden relief, like this was all finally going to end. But she couldn't be more wrong... as they stepped out of the office. One of the Officers turns her around and places her under arrest! Natsumi then panics and asks why?

Then the Officer who placed the hand-cuffs on her replied, "You are under arrest for suspicious of being a Child Predator."

After hearing this, Natsumi freaked and tried to explain she wasn't what ever that was and that she was trying to go home. The two officers escort her to the police car. As some students saw this all happening. Some of them were confused because it looked like their classmate Natsumi being arrested, but only taller!? Natsumi cried all the way to the station and just kept wishing she could just go home. It took less than 10 minutes to reach the station and as they arrived. They took Natsumi into the custody.

They finger printed her and placed her in a holding cell. While going through some files. The Police Desk lady went through some pictures and found Natsumi. But she was stunned, the tall girl looked just like her! But she thought, "That, that can't be!? It looks just like her, but taller!!" She stepped away from her desk and asked for the Police Psychologist to examine her. The nicely shaped middle-age Psychologist agreed to this and had her moved to a secure room for the two.

The two sat across from each other as the Psychologist calmly asked, "Are you feeling alright today?"

Natsumi shook her head yes, but then quickly no.

"Alright, why is it that you aren't feeling alright today?" the Psychologist asked softly.

Natsumi responded with a quick upset, "I just want to go home and see my Mommy!"

The Psychologist paused and then asked, "How old are you if I may ask?"

"I am a 8-year old girl and my name is Natsumi! I know I don't look it, but I have been growing since this morning I think!" Natsumi said in a panic.

At first the Police Psychologist was concerned, "But as she examined the so called sexual predator. She quickly noticed this person in front of her had the body of a healthy child. This wasn't a woman, this was a kid! A very tall kid!"

The Police Psychologist asks if she may leave the room for just a few seconds. Natsumi didn't want to be left alone at first, but changed her mind as she just wanted to be left alone. Since it felt like no one was helping her. She leaves Natsumi in the room alone. A minute later. The woman enters the room and tells Natsumi that they got ahold of the school and contacted her mother.

Natsumi was so happy to hear this. Finally she would be able to go home!

1152.content:
It was a bright sunny morning. The sun has just begun to rise across the beautiful country of Japan and the light was peeking into a young girl's bedroom. She only stood a mere 3'4" Feet tall at the age of 9-years old. She was pretty short, even for a Japanese child. The sun's light swept across the bedroom floor, till it rested upon Natsumi's youthful face. After almost 30 seconds, the light awoke her. She slowly sat up to stretch and turn to leave her bed. As she stepped onto the floor, she wiggled her toes on the carpet. It was something she enjoyed doing each and every morning she awoke. She swayed her big feet against the carpet fibers and enjoyed the feeling. Blushing slightly, Natsumi let out a soft giggle. With another stretch, she walked over to her dresser and tried to reach for something above her, but just couldn't reach it. Not even hopping up and down helped...

You see, Natsumi was short in every way, with only one feature being the acceptation... and that was her feet! Her feet were actually bigger than average, even for any other race. She sported a 10" inch long feet or 7.5 Women's shoe size! She was quite embarrassed of anyone seeing her feet. She wasn't ashamed of them, but didn't like how people reacted and talked about how big her feet were compared to other girls and even adult women. Another reason was how her mother and other people would poke fun at the fact and joke around that her feet just beat the rest of her and she was just going to play catch up when she hit's puberty.

In short, they teased the fact since her feet were so big, she was going to get really tall as well when she starts womanhood. She feared that when puberty did hit. Her breasts would grow to enormous proportions and she would reach a towering height to boot! Perhaps she would grow so tall she wouldn't fit in any of her clothes, her house, or the world! But again, her imagination would sometimes get the best of her. Another problem she had was, besides worries that just wouldn't come true in real life, was when she gets really shy or becomes really embarrassed. She starts to...

"Hey Natsumi! I thought I heard your big feet hit the floor." older sister Yulee teased while passing by her bedroom.

After hearing this, Natsumi grew slightly embarrassed and started to hiccup! Yep, you see, when she gets embarrassed or is shy. She starts to hiccup and depending on bad she feels emotionally in either or, is how bad her hiccups are. So they can be a lite 2 to 3 hiccups, to a serve hard 10 or more! Like gut hurting at times. But she rarely has those for the most part.

Natsumi left her bedroom and entered into the bathroom, where her twin little sisters, May and Yalmy were brushing their teeth before kindergarten. They were 6-years old and they obtained Natsumi's odd feature as well. They had a adult women's 2 shoe size! So not as bad as their older sister Natsumi, but definitely above the average. Now Somehow their oldest sister Yulee, didn't get big feet, but a bigger bust than the average a Japanese woman would normally see. Around the D bust area and she was only 12!

"Hi, Big feet!"

"Yeah, hi-ya BIG feet."

Both May and Yalmy greeted. This caused Natsumi to sigh softly as she responded back, "Hi, twin big foot..." You see her little sisters enjoyed having big feet and didn't see any harm to greet one another this way. This didn't embarrass Natsumi as bad, if it was said by others. Since for one, they aren't teasing her and two they like having big feet. However... there was one thing the two did that did embarrass her.

"Hey, Yalmy! I think slightly bigger sis looks even bigger today!" May giggled as she pointed with a toothbrush in her mouth.

Yalmy turned and giggled as well, "Yes, she looks 50 times BIGGER!"

Hearing this Natsumi started to hiccup. This caused her two little sisters to giggle harder. That was when Yalmy rolled up her shirt to expose her midriff and tease, "Oh no, my-my shirt has shrunken on me! I am gonna be too big now!" This caused Natsumi's hiccups to become worse and she quickly left the bathroom leaving her two sisters giggling. Now the only reason those two would even joke about this was the fact that Yulee wasn't paying attention one evening when their mother, 'Len' was out gathering some simple ingredients for dinner that night. They had gotten on the computer and wanted to look up big feet, but instead found a bunch of videos about women growing really, really BIG and growing out of their clothes.

This not only interested them into growing really, really BIG. When they found this to embarrass their older sister Natsumi. It was when the fun really began. And hearing the jokes about big feet leading to growing really tall. It was just salt on the wounds... though too young to truly understand their feelings of growing into giantess. They still found those videos and anything relating to them entertaining to say the least.

The rest of the morning before school was uneventful to say the least. The four girls walked to school as Yulee's middle school was just eight blocks down, with Natsumi, May, and Yalmy's were next to each other just three blocks further. So this was very convenient for their family. While on their walk to school. Yulee would be on her phone texting to her friends, with Natsumi enjoying the sights along the way, and May and Yalmy playing with each other. Either doing rock, paper, scissors or something along those lines. So pretty much a average uneventful day. Classes started and they were picking up lessons from yesterday. However Natsumi was only half-way paying attention as it was just such a beautiful day and what the teacher was teaching was just so boring...

But it was then a loud snap was heard! This startled all the students as they all looked forward at the teacher, "Natsumi! Pay attention now!" the teacher ordered. Natsumi blushed and apologies to the teacher. Though not before going into a slight hiccup fit. This caused all the students to laugh at her. Which only upset the teacher more as she yelled for order. The laughter quickly fell silent, with only Natsumi's hiccups being heard in the background. Though she was able to stop them as the class calmed down.

The Teacher went back to teaching her lesson and Natsumi tried her best to pay attention. The next class followed and was more of the same boring lessons... it was soon lunch period and this was Natsumi's favorite time as she would go outside and enjoy the fresh air while eating. Lying across a bench, Natsumi took in a deep breath and softly let it out. Life wasn't bad for her and was pretty normal with very little hiccups on the road (Sorry for the pun) but unknowing to her and everyone around her. The somewhat normal life she knew, was about to change when...

As the spoiled brat who just turned 12 impatiently waited all day nothing unexpected happened as the day wore on and she did possibly everything she could think of nothing out of the ordinary happened not that Tiffany expected it to.

Finally nighttime fell and Tiffany was about to take her full hour long shower when she noticed something: "Huh? What th-hey I'm a bit taller! H-how did this happened?" She pondered as she noticed her feet were a tad bigger and wider than before and her chest area which was previously flat was now sprouting two small mounds that weren't there before and her behind was far more bigger and bubbly compared to just this morning Tiffany was complexed but at the same time highly interested and amazed to how this miracle happened

"Whoa! I'm bigger than before totally awesome!!" She cried out as she realized her perspective was higher in the shower, "Totally rad! Just wait til mom and dad get back home won't they be in for a shock!!"

"By the time it was close to her curfew Tiffany noticed she was growing a bit bigger now as she used her built in height app on her phone to measure herself she weighted a total of

"5 feet 2 inches tall? Cool!" Tiffany said to herself and she went to put some clothes on. She fond her clothes were ill fitting now. She looked silly now as it was a tad revealing and tight looking. But she liked the look as she knew it would get her lots of attention from her folks and that just made her so giddy.

"Wow! Now I'm practically an adult sized woman!! Cool!" She cried "Just how much taller and wider am I going to get?" She thought happily her answer would come sooner than she thought, when...
1543.title: Grew a foot taller!?

choices: They didn't notice the changes and this upsets Tiffany?
They do noitce, but react in a drunk way?
15432.content:
Just as Tiffany was anxiously waiting for the next round of growth she heard a loud banging on the front door "Ahhhhh who is calling at this time of night? Surely mom and dad can't be back home already!!" Tiffany fumed as she flipped off her bed and headed downstairs to the front door. Now standing 5'2. She immediately noticed the change in perspective. Yes it was only a foot higher, but... (Compared to everyone else Tiffany was considered a really short person;practically everyone else in school towered over her!). So this additional foot in height changed things for her, even in the slightest.

As she made her way to the front door, she thought about maybe giving whomever it was a little show of skin. But when she made it to the door, she heard, "Eh sweetie can you let us in?", Her father called out from the other side of the front door, "We have been out all night and had a bit too much to drink....."

Then she heard her mother say, "Your father forgot the keys Tiffany please can you let us in?" sounding a bit tipsy herself.

"Great they get to stay out all night and get drunk while I'm stuck here! Darn it! But oh well at least maybe I'll be able to give them quite a surprise once they see me!! Probably won't even notice as I only grew a foot taller, but will be fun to see how long it takes for them to notice." Tiffany fumed angrily but complied opening the door the moment her parents saw their previously tiny daughter they.....
15432.title: She hears a knock at the front door?

155.content:
Alright 3 more chances to create a story. Please remember, she must be between the Ages of 8-12 Years Old! Not younger than 8 Years-Old and No Older than 12 Years-Old. Also Giantess is the only growth allowed and must be the main focus. Although Breast growth is allowed and some changes body wise. Just no weight gain, muscle growth. Just GTS and BE only. Also No Age progression, they must remain there age when changing. This makes for more unstable giantess and can end up causing major problems for everyone. Have fun and please be detailed and growth must be slow. Thank you and have a good day everyone.


Re-cap Bio of Tiffany


Tiffany
Height / 4'2
Skin / Australian
Personality / Likes to have it her way and is pretty spoiled.
Likes / Loves Attention and girly things
Dislikes / People ignoring her

Notes /
Tiffany is just the definition of future stripper to be. She is hoping to fill out nicely, and if not willing to do just about anything to get more attention... (ANYTHING) she is also at risk of becoming very sexual active at an early age. Also she believes the world is to move around her and that is it. She isn't a monster, but if you don't give her what she wants, well it could be risky. She is hoping for the puberty bug to happen now, rather than later.
155.title: Tiffany's Age Choices Set 2

[Please Read Rules before adding to this interactive. They can be found below the updates]

[06/03/20] Hello folks, been a while hasn't it? I'm sorry, a lot has been going on in my life, but the same can be said about my interactive here as well too. The author, Alex15678. A newbie to here, but not to writing as the latest chapters added by him are just fantastic!! He also has a DeviantArt account, by the name of, TFCreator. If you liked his additions on here, he'll be working on different giantess growth and transformation stories as well in the months to come. So again, if you like his additions. Give him a shout out on here and DeviantArt.

Thank you again Alex, for those fine chapters!

[08/23/19] This interactive has been seeing quite some actively as of late. Which is wonderful to see! It still has a long ways to go, but thanks to the wonderful contributors here on Writing.com. This interactive is getting some love it's been needing for some time.

So thank you again to all those who've been updating it and especially to those who do it regularly. However, if you do add to this interactive, please read the rules. Been getting a few chapters that aren't following this and they had to be deleted sadly, while some are going down the wrong path. Though good news, this is far and very limited in between all the chapters being added. Just wanted to give a heads up.

Last but not least. Another comic script I wrote was approved by GiantessFanComics! So look forward to the finale of Pool Party Growth Comic and a new comic to come down the line as well :)

Take it easy everyone and keep on adding to, A Girl's Growth Spurt Overload Interactive.



[07/04/19] Well 2019 is here and today is the 4th of July! I'm real sorry for the lack of update on this page here. But in my absences, this interactive has been doing quite well. Thanks to some talented writers who care to continue it on. I will be adding some my self very soon I hope, but been having writing issues. A lot has happen this year, mostly bad, won't lie. But still better than last year ^^;

Thank you everyone for the support and helping keep this interactive alive and well. And allowing it to be enjoyed by many others as well.

On that note, I will soon have the final comic of, "Pool Party Growth" being wrapped up soon. So if you haven't bought a membership at GiantessFanComics yet, please do so now and enjoy not only the comic that's based off my hit story, but the many other great comics on there as well, https://www.giantessfan.com/comics/

Take care everyone and hope to see you all again soon!


[05/05/18] A brighter update this time around, I want to give a, "BIG THANKS" to Tsuyo (emperorzip8500) who has been giving my interactive a lot of love. I am sadden he is still the only one keeping up with this interactive. But I wanted to thank him in this update. I hope others will follow his example and help write chapters for this interactive. He has also been adding to other interactives as well. So be sure to check them out as well. His writing is really good and worth looking into. Other than that, not much else to report. I hope to have bigger news in my next update and I hope to add some chapters myself in-between all of that.

On another note, my very first comic I wrote a script for is being released soon on May 15th!! So here is the link to download it - https://www.giantessfan.com/comics/Pool-Party-Growth/c=188/ it just cost a month subscription to GiantessFan, which allows you to download other comics as well. I will have other comics being made as well, so keep your eyes pealed. This is also issue 1 of a 4-part comic series. So let me know what you think about it and thank the wonderful artist who drew it as well. Take care everyone and hope to see more entries to this great interactive as well.

[03/05/18] A new year and sorry for the late, late update and lack of additional chapters from myself or others. A lot has happened since the last update... my mother passed on 12/26/17 and that was a rough blow to me. If anyone has read my Deviantart Journal Entry, you will understand why I haven't been on here or added much on either site sadly. I am hoping the things in my life become smoother and get better, but until then, I will do my best to hold everything together. Thank you all for your support on this interactive and if you like it, please review and add if you can. Be sure to read the rules first, but please add on, so others may enjoy this interactive. I will again try my best to add to it as well to show my support as well. Thank you all and have a good week.

[12/21/17] Well 2017 is coming to a close... But not this interactive however. Been getting a few new chapters here and there and it's great to see. It could be doing a lot better, but I am thankful I have good friends and fans that care about this interactive. I hope it continues to grow even further into 2018 (Pun intended) I hope as we enter into the new year, this interactive becomes even more lively! I will try to add more myself, but real life issues will be holding me back I am afraid...

But fear not, I will still do my share as well. Thank you all who have supported this interactive and please send others my way who you think would be interested in adding to this and can add good chapters. Thank you all once again for your hard work and dedication.

~Have a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year's

[08/21/17] New year and a very, very late update. This interactive is still Lacking many chapters sadly to report again... but has closely reached the 100 chapter Milestone. So all is not Doom and Gloom. But honestly, this interactive needs a nice shot to the arm. So if you are a good writer or know of someone who is, please, PLEASE add to this interactive. Of course I want Quality over Quantity, so please remember that. There are very few interactive's that deal in such a young age range and I know that to some this is not favorable to them.

But of course the same can be to those who like Vore or Feet. Everyone has different taste and I think even if this genre is unpopular. Some people like it. Plus it's harmless fiction folks, so no harm, no foul. I mean people don't shame those who like vore and trust me, there is some disturbing vore material out there. Same can be said for loli. But heck, this interactive is tamed compered to the others out there. There is just too little young GTS stories out there. So I wanted to change that. Granted this interactive hasn't gain nearly as many chapters as I hoped it would have by now and some parts I am to blame. I won't lie.

Though the same can be said to everyone else. If you want change... you need to start it with yourself. So please show this Interactive some love and bring so entertainment to a very small and isolated sub-group. I will try my best to add here and there. But due to personal issues in real life. It will be difficult I am afraid, which disappoints me. As I use to work a lot on this stuff. But I suppose everything must come to an end eventually.

Well I want to leave this update on a brighter message. Thank you all who have added to this interactive and I hope you continue to support it into the future. Thank you once again and good luck to all.


[12/29/16] Well folks 2016 is coming to a close, finally... I hope everyone had a great holiday. As we near into a new year, this interactive is still majorly lacking chapters... which is a shame to say as this means in the 6-months since my last update here. Nothing has changed much :/ However! There have still been a few 'Loyal' members/friends on here who have added a bit, so to them a massive THANK YOU! But to the rest... come on, the rules are simple. Show some love. Interactives don't just write themselves. So come on, if you have an idea for a new chapter, add then! (Following the rules of course)

Also wow, just wow. I was struggling to make it to 4,000 views, but in just 6-months this Interactive has reached over 28,000 views!!? Holy cow! Thank you for all who have viewed this interactive. Now if we can just get the chapters that are added to be a lot higher. Then we will be in business :) So come on! A new year will soon be upon us and is a good reason to show this interactive love and to show writing.com and this interactive isn't dead! Thank you all again who've supported this interactive and I hope to see more chapters very soon from you all. And with that said, see you all into a new year and may 2017 bring good things your way. Good luck everyone.


[06/20/16] Been quite a time since I've updated this part. My bad everyone... Well anyways, looks like in almost 6-months, this interactive has gained over 4,000 views since, which really isn't too bad to be honest. So thank you all. And chapters could be a LOT better, but still the adds are quite slow, which I'm sadden to be here to say that once more :/ However, I have noticed a few on here who have added more than 2 chapters to it, so a massive thank you to all who even bothered adding, and a bigger thank you to all who have added more than 1 chapter. Thank you to the both really. I haven't added in some time still, but kind of hard when folks don't seem to want to add to the chapters I have left for them to add to...

But anyways, I just wanted to thank everyone who has helped this interactive stay alive and I hope those who have added and that more will keep adding to help this grow even more. It needs some love and if it can start becoming active once again, I'll try to add a little to help out as well. I don't know when I'll be back to update this page, but it shouldn't be as long as a wait like the last time. I hope everyone has a safe and fun holiday weekend that is coming up in the next few weeks. Also don't forget to check out my DeviantArt page - http://redacegod350.deviantart.com/ as I have updated that once a few times. Let's continue to work hard and help this interactive and all interactives we enjoy. Have a great week and see you all later.


[01/17/16] Well New Year, same Interactive. Though I am clearing to the 20,000 marker! Which means this interactive is getting way more foot traffic than it was getting. Sadly however, the additions to chapters show other wise. With only one new addition this year alone, and very few since my last update. I can't lie, it's a bit of a downer. Yes I could add a few myself, but what is the point when others aren't adding too. This is an interactive after all. So if a few more start adding and regularly, I'll start trying to add more often as well. So please, if your reading this. Add to it and if you do, try to be more frequent as well. Don't add one chapter and then disappear forever ^^; But none the less, thank you all for allowing to grow as big as it got and for the views, I didn't even think it would get this far to be honest. Good luck to everyone in the New Year and let's try to be more active across this site in general.



(Rule Update / This Interactive rules were cleaned up thanks to my friend Detective Barricade http://www.writing.com/main/portfolio/view/dbarricade They are basically the same rules, just more cleaned up ) - 08/17/15


Awesome, 61 Chapters with 11,100 views now?! This is great. A Huge Thanks to my dear friends who have helped my story grow. I'm happy to see others are adding to this other than me. Though I haven't been adding to this for some time. I have fallen out of place with this site and just writing altogether, so I apologies. But more folks can still be adding to this. So please everyone continue to add and help it grow. Even if I don't add to this much anymore, this shouldn't be a reason to let it fad. I want others to enjoy this interactive. Also I would like to see some additions to Tiffany's character, so if you have a good idea, please add to her. She needs some love. Also lastly, please read the rules! I won't say who, but some are not following the, "Write in detail rule"... But I digress, again thank you to thus who've added thus far. I feel like writing a little more, so I will be adding to this one again. Keep on writing and help keep the GTS and all other forms of Expansion healthy and alive!


~Red Out


Wow, 3,000+ Views and with only 25 Chapters?! Thank you everyone for the views, though I would also like to see more chapters added to this, who aren't me... So please read the Rules carefully and continue to read and write on. Once again, thank you for all the views.


(Plot Summary)
Chose how girl(s) go through what is suppose to be a normal puberty. But something causes their changes to get overloaded. Also some maybe late bloomers and use some kind of mean to accelerate their changes, but in doing so causes them to get more than what they ever wanted. So in a nut shell, it's all about girls have their puberty or trying to speed up puberty and getting something much bigger in return.


--Rules--

I reserve the right to edit or remove any chapter(s) that breaks the rules. But of course I will be fair in each and all cases. Just follow the rules and you'll have nothing to worry about. If you're not sure your addition(s) matches the rules for this interactive, then please feel free to message me with your question and I will reply to it as soon as I can.

(1.) This Interactive is about Giantess and to a lesser extent Breast Expansion. No male growth, weight gain, or anything that isn't GTS or BE. Other girls can grow too, but please stay close to the girl of choice. No shrinking below the girl's starting height, and she must grow again eventually.

(2.) Absolutely no age progression. The girls stay their starting age. Allowed ages are 8-12 Years of age, no exceptions. I'm sorry.

(3.) While Breast Expansion is allowed, it should be kept to a minimal next to growth if any is to occur.

(4.) Clothes DO NOT grow with the girl for any reason. Growth MUST be detailed, and should take almost a full chapter for a change to become noticeable. Chapters containing fast or instant growth, especially without detail, will be deleted.

(5.) Be detailed in your additions. (that includes plot, story, characters, and expansion) and a minimum of a paragraph in length. (4 to 7 sentences) Longer chapters are highly encouraged.

(6.) All the girls can have up to 3 siblings at a time. If they do, please provide a detailed bio so folks adding have an idea of what they're like. (the bios in the opening chapter are a good example of what to do) It would be preferred if most of them are younger or slightly older sisters, but anything up to around 21 years is fine for the siblings.

(7.) Please keep extreme language and/or violence to a bare minimum. Toilet stuff is not allowed.

(8.) Grammar doesn't need to be perfect, just readable.

(9.) No sex or rape at all, but groping and such is fine. Just don't be too extreme about it. This is more about growing giantess(es) and such.

(10.) Please don't end the story. If you plan on doing so, email me first before you do.

(11.) Destruction and Vore are allowed, but try to keep the girls to how they would normally react to their changes. (if they wouldn't think about doing it as a normal girl, they probably won't as a giantess) A rampage can occur, but a good, personality-fitting reason for it is needed. Playful destruction is encouraged over evil.

(12.) While there's no limit on how big a giantess can be, please try to keep her height and proportions reasonable. Don't make her too big too quickly, and keep the focus on her height rather than her bust. She should still manage to stand.

Sorry if I come off strict, but I know what works. So try to have fun, and try to write some good additions so this can be a fun to read and good interactive for everyone. Best of luck to everyone.
